entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. High 26. Humidex 27. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 70%
